alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 21 at 1:44PM MST until November 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Northern Sioux County. In Wyoming, South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 11 AM MST Thursday morning through 11 PM MST Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures are expected to be present on Friday and Friday night. Impacts to local agriculture, including the ranching community are possible as wind chills near or below zero will be present.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
